about_the_game:
This is the Demo version of Salvus: Aries, covering the common route and a glimpse of the paths with some of the characters in the game. Audio has been remastered, sprites have been refreshed, and one character in particular has been added in but is still a work-in-progress.

Note: Not all features detailed in the full version are in the demo version of the game.
